snippet: The loss of the Izod Center, in the Meadowlands, will be a boon for the Prudential Center in Newark, the current home of the Devils.
abstract: New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority votes 10 to 2 to shut down Izod Center in East Rutherford; arena has been ailing financially following departure of New Jersey Devils and Brooklyn Nets for other venues.
lead_paragraph: The loss of the Izod Center, in the Meadowlands, will be a boon for the Prudential Center in Newark, the current home of the Devils.

headline.main: Deserted by Devils, Nets and Profits, Izod Center in North Jersey Is to Close
headline.print_headline: Deserted by Devils, Nets and Profits, Izod Center in North Jersey Is to Close

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority
